articles.title: Gold price rallies, eyeing weekly finish in the green amid lower US bond yields - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price resumes its weekly uptrend on Friday and is set to finish the week in the green, taking advantage of the fall in US Treasury bond yields amid quiet news flows.
articles.content:
